Package src.service

Class ApplicantApplicationService

java.lang.Object
src.service.ApplicantApplicationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicantApplicationService
public class ApplicantApplicationService extends Object implements IApplicantApplicationService
Handles application-related features for applicants in the BTO system. - Apply for eligible projects - Submit a flat type - Withdraw their application if needed It checks for application status and ensures applicants donâ€™t apply twice or withdraw after booking a flat.

    • submitApplication

      public boolean submitApplication(Applicant applicant, Project project, String flatType)
      Applies for a selected project with the chosen flat type and saves updates to CSV.
      Specified by:
      submitApplication in interface IApplicantApplicationService
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the application.
      project - The selected project.
      flatType - The flat type (2-Room or 3-Room).
      Returns:
      True if successful; false if already applied or any issues occur.
